Class PerceptronLearner

  • java.lang.Object
    • PerceptronLearner

  • public class PerceptronLearner
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements Single-layer Perceptron algorithm for n-dimensional vectors.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int learningRate
      learning rate of the perceptron
      int threshold
      threshold for positive and negative classification

    • Method Detail

      • modifyWeights

        public PVector modifyWeights(PVector item,
                             PVector weight,
                             int predicted,
                             int actual)
        A function for modifying weights when train item classified incorrectly.
        Parameters:
        item - train item that has been classified incorrectly
        weight - previously used weight that cause incorrect classification
        predicted - the result of the classification
        actual - the expected classification
        Returns:
        modified weight

      • predict

        public boolean predict(PVector item,
                       PVector weights)
        A function for predicting the class of an item by comparing with the threshold.
        Parameters:
        item - train item that is to be classified
        weights - the currently used weights for classification
        Returns:
        predicted classification (true if "+"; false if "-")

      • train

        public PVector train(PVector item,
                     boolean isPositive,
                     PVector weights)
        A function for training an iteration in the current epoch.
        Parameters:
        item - train item that is to be classified
        isPositive - if the currently considered item should be positively classified
        weights - the currently used weights for classification
        Returns:
        weights that has or has not been modified depending on the result of prediction

      • initializeWeights

        public PVector initializeWeights(int dimension)
        A function for initializing weight before the first use.
        Parameters:
        dimension - a dimension of the output weights vector
        Returns:
        vector weights filled with 1's of the specified dimension

      • biasVectorChange

        public java.util.List<PVector> biasVectorChange(java.util.List<PVector> vectors)
        A function that extends vectors with 1's for the biased cases.
        Parameters:
        vectors - a vector whose dimension is to be extended
        Returns:
        vectors extended with 1's to the next dimension

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute(java.util.List<PVector> positive,
                                java.util.List<PVector> negative,
                                java.lang.Boolean bias,
                                java.lang.Integer maxIterations,
                                java.util.List<PVector> queries)
        A function that implements perceptron.
        Parameters:
        positive - vectors that should be positively classified
        negative - vectors that should be negatively classified
        bias - indication whether bias should be applied to vectors
        maxIterations - the max number of epochs available to train perceptron
        queries - vectors that should be classified using the perceptron trained with positive and negative
        Returns:
        a string containing the following: - the number of epochs needed to train the perceptron - if trained, the classifications of queries ("+" or "-")
